review_text: I replaced my original mini-prep with this item after the plastic housing on the steel knife split.  The first one lasted about ten years, and I used it quite often, tho it was not abused.  Love the handiness of this item, it stores easily with a small footprint, parts go in the dishwasher for quick cleanup, just the right size for smaller jobs.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
